Writer: Edward Khmara (screenplay), Michael Thomas (screenplay), Tom Mankiewicz (screenplay), Edward Khmara (story)
Title: Ladyhawke
Actors: Matthew Broderick, Rutger Hauer, Michelle Pfeiffer, Leo McKern
Plot: Philipe Gastone, a thief, escapes from the dungeon at Aquila, sparking a manhunt. He is nearly captured when Captain Navarre befriends him. Navarre has been hunted by the Bishop's men for ...
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 5 nominations.
